00019 #ifndef __HID_H__
00020 #define __HID_H__
00021 
00022 #if defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00023 #define __packed __attribute__((__packed__))
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 
00027 /* HID Subclass Codes */
00028 #define HID_SUBCLASS_NONE               0x00
00029 #define HID_SUBCLASS_BOOT               0x01
00030 
00031 /* HID Protocol Codes */
00032 #define HID_PROTOCOL_NONE               0x00
00033 #define HID_PROTOCOL_KEYBOARD           0x01
00034 #define HID_PROTOCOL_MOUSE              0x02
00035 
00036 
00037 /* HID Descriptor Types */
00038 #define HID_HID_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE         0x21
00039 #define HID_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE      0x22
00040 #define HID_PHYSICAL_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE    0x23
00041 
00042 
00043 /* HID Descriptor */
00044 #if defined     (  __CC_ARM  )
00045 typedef __packed struct _HID_DESCRIPTOR {
00046 #elif defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00047 typedef struct __packed _HID_DESCRIPTOR {
00048 #elif defined   (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00049 #pragma pack(1)
00050 typedef struct _HID_DESCRIPTOR {
00051 #endif
00052   uint8_t  bLength;
00053   uint8_t  bDescriptorType;
00054   uint16_t  bcdHID;
00055   uint8_t  bCountryCode;
00056   uint8_t  bNumDescriptors;
00057   /* Array of one or more descriptors */
00058 #if defined     (  __CC_ARM  )
00059   __packed struct _HID_DESCRIPTOR_LIST {
00060 #elif defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00061   struct __packed _HID_DESCRIPTOR_LIST {
00062 #elif defined   (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00063 #pragma pack(1)
00064   struct _HID_DESCRIPTOR_LIST {
00065 #endif
00066     uint8_t  bDescriptorType;
00067     uint16_t  wDescriptorLength;
00068   } DescriptorList[1];
00069 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00070 #pragma pack()
00071 #endif
00072 } HID_DESCRIPTOR;
00073 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00074 #pragma pack()
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 /* HID Request Codes */
00078 #define HID_REQUEST_GET_REPORT          0x01
00079 #define HID_REQUEST_GET_IDLE            0x02
00080 #define HID_REQUEST_GET_PROTOCOL        0x03
00081 #define HID_REQUEST_SET_REPORT          0x09
00082 #define HID_REQUEST_SET_IDLE            0x0A
00083 #define HID_REQUEST_SET_PROTOCOL        0x0B
00084

00087 #define HID_REPORT_OUTPUT               0x02
00088 #define HID_REPORT_FEATURE              0x03

00290 /* Button Page (0x09) */
00291 /*   There is no need to label these usages. */
00292

00294 /*   There is no need to label these usages. */

00313 /* HID Report Item Macros */
00314 
00315 /* Main Items */
00316 #define HID_Input(x)           0x81,x
00317 #define HID_Output(x)          0x91,x
00318 #define HID_Feature(x)         0xB1,x
00319 #define HID_Collection(x)      0xA1,x
00320 #define HID_EndCollection      0xC0
00321 
00322 /* Data (Input, Output, Feature) */
00323 #define HID_Data               0<<0
00324 #define HID_Constant           1<<0
00325 #define HID_Array              0<<1
00326 #define HID_Variable           1<<1
00327 #define HID_Absolute           0<<2
00328 #define HID_Relative           1<<2
00329 #define HID_NoWrap             0<<3
00330 #define HID_Wrap               1<<3
00331 #define HID_Linear             0<<4
00332 #define HID_NonLinear          1<<4
00333 #define HID_PreferredState     0<<5
00334 #define HID_NoPreferred        1<<5
00335 #define HID_NoNullPosition     0<<6
00336 #define HID_NullState          1<<6
00337 #define HID_NonVolatile        0<<7
00338 #define HID_Volatile           1<<7
00339 
00340 /* Collection Data */
00341 #define HID_Physical           0x00
00342 #define HID_Application        0x01
00343 #define HID_Logical            0x02
00344 #define HID_Report             0x03
00345 #define HID_NamedArray         0x04
00346 #define HID_UsageSwitch        0x05
00347 #define HID_UsageModifier      0x06
00348 
00349 /* Global Items */
00350 #define HID_UsagePage(x)       0x05,x
00351 #define HID_UsagePageVendor(x) 0x06,x,0xFF
00352 #define HID_LogicalMin(x)      0x15,x
00353 #define HID_LogicalMinS(x)     0x16,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF)
00354 #define HID_LogicalMinL(x)     0x17,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF),((x>>16)&0xFF),((x>>24)&0xFF)
00355 #define HID_LogicalMax(x)      0x25,x
00356 #define HID_LogicalMaxS(x)     0x26,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF)
00357 #define HID_LogicalMaxL(x)     0x27,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF),((x>>16)&0xFF),((x>>24)&0xFF)
00358 #define HID_PhysicalMin(x)     0x35,x
00359 #define HID_PhysicalMinS(x)    0x36,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF)
00360 #define HID_PhysicalMinL(x)    0x37,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF),((x>>16)&0xFF),((x>>24)&0xFF)
00361 #define HID_PhysicalMax(x)     0x45,x
00362 #define HID_PhysicalMaxS(x)    0x46,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF)
00363 #define HID_PhysicalMaxL(x)    0x47,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF),((x>>16)&0xFF),((x>>24)&0xFF)
00364 #define HID_UnitExponent(x)    0x55,x
00365 #define HID_Unit(x)            0x65,x
00366 #define HID_UnitS(x)           0x66,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF)
00367 #define HID_UnitL(x)           0x67,(x&0xFF),((x>>8)&0xFF),((x>>16)&0xFF),((x>>24)&0xFF)
00368 #define HID_ReportSize(x)      0x75,x
00369 #define HID_ReportID(x)        0x85,x
00370 #define HID_ReportCount(x)     0x95,x
00371 #define HID_Push               0xA0
00372 #define HID_Pop                0xB0
00373 
00374 /* Local Items */
00375 #define HID_Usage(x)           0x09,x
00376 #define HID_UsageMin(x)        0x19,x
00377 #define HID_UsageMax(x)        0x29,x
